mapper.select: SELECT PC_COMMENT, UI_NICKNAME, PC_CREDAT FROM PARTY_COMMENT PC INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PC.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM WHERE PI_NUM = #{piNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY_COMMENT( PC_COMMENT, PC_CREDAT, PC_CRETIM, PC_LMODAT, PC_LMOTIM, PC_ACTIVE, PI_NUM, UI_NUM) VALUES( #{pcComment}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%r'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%r'), 1, #{piNum}, #{uiNum})
